title: Content Telemetry Web Asset
description: Asset details associated to a web element

repo:id.title: Asset Id
repo:id.description: A unique identifier given to every addressable asset in a given repository.

dc:format.title: Asset format
dc:format.description: The physical or digital manifestation of the resource. Typically, Format should include the media-type of the resource. Format may be used to determine the software, hardware or other equipment needed to display or operate the resource. Recommended best practice is to select a value from a controlled vocabulary (for example, the list of [Internet Media Types](http://www.iana.org/ assignments/media-types/) defining computer media formats).

repo:lastModifiedDate.description: The server date and time when the resource was last modified in the repository, such as when a new version of an asset is uploaded or a directory's child resource is added or removed. The date time property should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

xdm:url.title: Url
xdm:url.description: The absolute URL of the asset.

xdm:manualTags.title: Tags

items.title: Tag
items.description: The list of manually assigned tags for the asset

xdm:manualTags.description: The `keywords` property is used to track human-assigned descriptive phrases like keywords or tags of an asset. Rather than a plan list of tags, it is a structured set of keywords, where keywords can have an explicit importance ranking and a locale. This allows the management of multi-lingual keywords for a given asset. For machine-generated keywords, use the `machineKeywords` property.

xdm:predictedTags.title: Predicted Tags

items.title: Predicted tag
items.description: The `Predicted tag` schema describes a tag in a list of tags, with specific importance relative to other tags in the same list.

xmp:value.title: Value
xmp:value.description: The tag itself. A short description of the content of the webelement.

dc:language.description: Language of the keyword. The locale code should follow [RFC BCP 47](https://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

xdm:confidence.title: Confidence score
xdm:confidence.description: The confidence score of the predicted tag on a scale from zero to one.

xdm:predictedTags.description: The `predictedTags` property is used to track machine-generated tags of webelement like `text`.
